name: Space Colony (itch) (Celinium)
description:
Space Colony is a building-strategy game in which the player has to build a huge space station. The player has to consume and produce different kinds of ressources to build powerful living space station. Can you balance the income and outcome of your colony?

Developed in 8 weeks at the Games Academy Berlin.

Team Protobyte:

Production - Daniel Zummach
Programming - Hadi Behesti
Programming - Julian Franz
Game Design - Tim Mattern
Game Design - Tim Seligmann
3D Art - Celina Eichler
2D Art - Pascal Stromer
VFX - Hadi Behesti
Music - Lukas Piel
Mentor Production - Felix Günther
